Title: PURPLE AMETHYST AND LILAC ALEXANDRITE HANDMADE GEMSTONE BEADED NECKLACE
Description: Pretty necklace made up from deep purple highly polished Russian Amethysts and in the center 4 large Pale Lilac Alexandrite beads. Each oblong, which is gently faceted measures approx 14 mm x 10 mm. There are a further three small Alexandrite beads on either side.It closes with a Heart-Shaped Gold Filled Clasp. Very feminine and can be worn all year round with many different colors. Measures approx 17 inches. However this can be made longer or shorter to suit. Should you require a different length, please let me know at the time of ordering. Full bespoke service available. This is either Southport in the U.K or on the wonderfully unspoilt Greek Island of Evia. Either way, items will be dispatched as soon as payment has cleared.
